analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol:
	Contract XEPToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
XEPToken.RATE (/unique_chucks/20/0x57a3bd6ff182c36a16b2857da221f29d24b577a1.sol#110-113) is never used in XEPToken
